SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminController
AdminController extends the functionalities of EmployeeController to provide administrative actions that can be performed by admin users.
AuthController
AuthController handles the authentication processes for users of the FOMS system.
AuthStaffService
The AuthStaffService class provides methods to authenticate staff members.
AuthStore
The AuthStore class stores the current staff user.
Availability
 
Branch
Represents a branch of the restaurant.
BranchManager
Manages branch operations including adding, removing, printing, and setting the status of branches.
BranchStatus
 
BranchTextDB
BranchTextDB is a utility class that reads and writes Branch data to and from a text file.
Cart
The Cart class represents a shopping cart containing items selected by the customer.
CartItem
Represents an item in a shopping cart.
ChangeStatus
ChangeStatus class allows the staff to change the status of an order to COMPLETED.
CheckQuota
CheckQuota class checks the quota of staff and managers in a branch.
CheckStatus
CheckStatus class allows the staff to check the status of an order.
CustomerController
CustomerController manages the customer interactions with branches, allowing them to select a branch, place orders, check the status of orders, and collect orders.
DiningOption
 
EmployeeController
EmployeeController serves as a base class for all employee types within the system.
FomsApp
The FomsApp class is the main class that starts the application.
Gender
 
IBranchManagement
The IBranchManagement interface provides methods for managing branches.
IOrderManager
The IOrderManager interface outlines the operations necessary for managing orders.
IPayment
The IPayment interface defines a single method for processing payments.
IPaymentManagement
The IPaymentManagement interface provides methods for managing payment methods.
IStaffManagement
The IStaffManagement interface includes methods to manage staff accounts and activities.
ItemNotFoundException
 
ManagerController
ManagerController extends StaffController to provide managerial specific actions such as processing and viewing orders, managing the menu, and viewing staff information.
MenuDisplay
MenuDisplay class allows the staff to view the menu.
MenuItem
Represents a menu item in a branch.
MenuTextDB
MenuTextDB is a utility class that reads and writes MenuItem data to and from a text file.
NewOrder
Represents a new order made by a customer.
Order
Represents an order in the system.
OrderCancellation
Handles the cancellation of orders.
OrderLine
Represents an order line in the system.
OrderLineTextDB
OrderLineTextDB is a utility class that reads and writes OrderLine data to and from a text file.
OrderManager
OrderManager class allows the staff to process orders and view order details.
OrderStatus
 
OrderTextDB
OrderLineTextDB is a utility class that reads and writes OrderLine data to and from a text file.
Payment
Represents a payment method.
PaymentManager
PaymentManager class allows the staff to add, remove, and edit payment methods.
PaymentService
PaymentService class allows the staff to select a payment method.
PaymentTextDB
 
Receipt
This class handles the generation of receipts for orders.
Role
 
Staff
Represents a staff member.
StaffController
StaffController extends the EmployeeController to provide general staff-related actions like displaying new orders, processing orders, and changing passwords.
StaffDisplay
StaffDisplay class allows the staff to view the staff list.
StaffManager
StaffManager class allows the manager to manage staff accounts.
StaffTextDB
StaffTextDB is a utility class that reads and writes Staff data to and from a text file.
